name: Potion Master: Create the Elixir of Life
name_original: Potion Master: Create the Elixir of Life
description:
Potion Master : Create the Elixir of Life

Potion Master was created by Orla McCorry for a university exercise and is the first game I ever made. The exercise was to create a game that had different interactions and it was close to halloween so I created a "find the ingredients for a spooky potion" game. 

I'm uploading this to remind myself how far I've come, and I am still proud of what I achieved here with only having a couple coding classes.

I hope you enjoy !

With assets by Solum Night, David Stenfors, AURYNSKY, Daniel Stephens, TEAM HUSHKAL STUDIOS, James White

And audio by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio, remaxim, bart, Freesoundeffects.co
